title: In before Ornn becomes perma banned and absolutely broken
body: Ornn might not be at worlds but with all the changes he's gotten I already know he will be beyond oppressive to play against in solo queue.

replies.body: They are finally going to make him into a real champ? woo, no more losing ornns of 35-18% wr, still awesome though.

Usually they release champs strong to gather interest, then nerf them down to normal.

Compare Ornn to new Galio as release.

Let's not assume that too early. He needed buffs because he was underperforming on his release the buffs incoming are addressing his issues especially his q. If will put more in line of where he's supposed to be. And make him viable.
